array.string: The ability to channel the energy of a volcano and create bursts of fire,lava, and smoke.
Can use thunder and lightning to destroy, damage, intimidate, set firesand cause fear and uncertainty in his enemies.
Controls all sharks on earth and as the keeper of the gourd of life, can give and take life at will.
Everything has its beauty but not everyone sees it.
Ignorance is the night of the mind, but a night without moon and star.
It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in getting up every time we do.
